channel.title: tesla on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in tesla on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-02
item.description: Google Soli Radar sees your intentions – and it’s less creepy and more helpful than you think (3 minute read) Google’s ATAP group recently unveiled its latest Soli Radar research project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-24
item.description: A Meta prototype lets you build virtual worlds by describing them (3 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg recently showed off a prototype of an artificial intelligence system that lets people build parts of virtual worlds by verbally describing them.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-15
item.description: Tesla starts deploying Starlink satellite internet systems at Supercharger stations (2 minute read) Tesla has started to deploy Starlink antennas at its Supercharger stations.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-08
item.description: Cruise lays out its plan for ‘how’ it will make robotaxis a reality (7 minute read) GM’s self-driving subsidiary Cruise recently presented a roadmap for how the company will build autonomous vehicles that will be safer and more scalable than any human-driven vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-27
item.description: Yahoo has built a new calendar app called Day, and it’s recruited the co-founder of Sunrise to design it (3 minute read) Day is a new standalone calendar app from Yahoo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-17
item.description: Alphabet’s Project Taara laser tech beamed 700TB of data across nearly 5km (3 minute read) While Google shut down Project Loon earlier this year, some of the technology remained in development.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-08
item.description: Hacker shows what Tesla Full Self-Driving’s vision depth perception neural net can see (2 minute read) A hacker who managed to get root access to a Tesla vehicle has unveiled Tesla’s vision depth perception neural net.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-02
item.description: Google helps map one cubic millimeter of human brain tissue that comes in at 1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-13
item.description: Elon Musk says Tesla will stop accepting bitcoin for car purchases, citing environmental concerns (3 minute read) Tesla has suspended vehicle purchases using bitcoin due to concerns over the increasing use of fossil fuels for bitcoin mining.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-28
item.description: Tesla’s new Boombox feature will let car owners fart at unsuspecting neighbors (2 minute read) Tesla has rolled out its 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-23
item.description: Elon Musk says Apple refused a meeting to acquire Tesla (2 minute read) Elon Musk attempted to sell Tesla to Apple during the Model 3 rollout in 2017.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-16
item.description: Facebook is having an end-of-year, company-wide meeting right now (Twitter Thread) This Twitter thread follows Facebook’s company-wide end-of-year meeting.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-02
item.description: People Are Jailbreaking Used Teslas to Get the Features They Expect (5 minute read) Tesla will sometimes claw back software upgrades from used cars, removing features that owners had paid for at the time of sale.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-21
item.description: Lucid beats Tesla Model S Plaid prototype on racetrack with its own tri-motor Air test vehicle (2 minute read) Lucid has beaten the Tesla Model S Plaid prototype’s Laguna Seca race track record with its Air electric vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-21
item.description: Uber can now deliver prescriptions in Seattle and Dallas (1 minute read) Uber has partnered with NimbleRx and expanded its Uber Health Business to include medicine delivery in Seattle and Dallas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-29
item.description: Apple threatens to remove Airbnb from App Store over virtual experiences commission (2 minute read) Apple has demanded a 30% commission for sales of online classes sold by Airbnb and ClassPass.
